summary: In his quest to become the world's greatest air-drummer, a small-town dreamer must overcome obstacles and ridicule to save the day.
cast: Ari Gold|Michael McKean|Jane Lynch|Shoshannah Stern|Chi Ling Chiu|Adrian Grenier|Luis Accinelli|Jennifer Barbosa|Karen Berg|John Bianco|Paul Boruff|Jacki R. Chan|Tony Devon|Markie Dunn|Richard Fancy|Annie Golden|Garry Goodrow|Scott Hanks|Wai Ching Ho|Jeff Holman|Albert Huerta|Tod Huntington|Jimmy Jean-Louis|Reginald M. Jernigan Jr.|Travis Johns|Helen Kelly|Nick Kroll|Samantha Maloney|Neil Peart|Olivia Peterson|Tuffy Questell|Kevin Rodriguez|Summer Rona|Kimberly Topper|Harry Van Gorkum|Nicole Wagner|Eric Wareheim|Tanya White|Steven Williams
title: Adventures of Power
